hero.title: Premium Pergolas & Winter Closures
hero.subtitle: Transform your outdoor space with custom pergolas and winter balcony closures. Expert craftsmanship, superior materials.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We specialize in designing and constructing custom pergolas and high-quality winter enclosures that combine innovative design with optimal functionality. With years of experience and uncompromising professionalism, we offer our clients solutions that enhance their outdoor spaces, making them usable and enjoyable throughout the year.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: Elite Pergolas exceeded all our expectations, delivering exceptional service and phenomenal results. Their expertise and attention to detail made our home buying experience truly remarkable.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.text: Working with Elite Pergolas has been transformative for our investment portfolio. Their market insights and professional guidance have been invaluable.
